text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Now, in to the last straight! With a lead of 5 to 6 lengths, Silence Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And here they press the attack and chase forward! Can Silence Suzuka do it?! There isn't much distance left between them!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: But Silence Suzuka accelerates here!! With her "Escape and Follow Through", the difference increases again!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Silence Suzuka! It's Silence Suzuka!! Silence Suzuka crosses the goal first!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: This time too, "Escape and Follow Through" Silence Suzuka is going strong! Surpassing all expectations, she claims an overwhelming victory!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: As I thought, running is fun…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: From now on, that "scenery" that's never been seen before. Together, with everyone…!
